Author: Allison
Description:
Raptor mini, a new experimental model, is now rolling out in GitHub Copilot to Pro, Pro+, and Free plans in Visual Studio Code. You’ll be able to select the model…

The post [Raptor mini is rolling out in public preview for GitHub Copilot](https://github.blog/changelog/2025-11-10-raptor-mini-is-rolling-out-in-public-preview-for-github-copilot) appeared first on [The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog).
EnhancedContent:
Raptor mini, a new experimental model, is now rolling out in GitHub Copilot to Pro, Pro+, and Free plans in Visual Studio Code.

You’ll be able to select the model in the Copilot Chat model picker from Visual Studio Code in chat, ask, edit, and agent modes.

Rollout will be gradual. Check back soon if you don’t see it yet.

### Learn more

To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see [our documentation on models](https://docs.github.com/copilot/reference/ai-models/supported-models) and get started with Copilot.

### Share your feedback

Have feedback or questions? Join the [community discussion](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/categories/copilot-conversations) to share your experiences and tips.
Title: Raptor mini is rolling out in public preview for GitHub Copilot
